intro: Turn the knob of the potentiometer to seechange in brightness

steps: 1. Place the LED and one 220 ohm resistor on the breadoard
2. Connect a jumper wire between the LED and the resistor
3. Connect a jumper wire from D3 to one side of the resistor
1. Place the potentiometer on the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from A7 to the middlepin of the potentiometer
3. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the third pin of the potentiometer
1. Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the first pin of the potentiometer
3. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the neative of the LED
4. Run the project and go to Play section
